a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Total confirmed COVID-19 cases, by source, World
Confirmed COVID-19 cases are compared for the three main data sources:
– European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC)
Data source: Johns Hopkins University (2023); WHO COVID-2019 Situation Reports; ECDC (2020)
Note: The number of confirmed cases is lower than the number of total cases. The main reason for this is limited testing.
